con:testCase.name: GoodCase-DEV-DATQIT
con:testCase.con:description: Tests test-case scenarios described in user story: https://www.sg.de.o2.com/jira/browse/DRC-2690 Tests file transfer dat from drc to target bank directory Tests file transfer qit from target bank directory to drc Validate file existence in target directories Validate states in data base

con:config.con:query: SELECT DAT_FILENAME, PROCESSING_STATUS, DAT_DOWNLOAD_DATE, DAT_UPLOAD_DATE, QIT_FILENAME, QIT_STATUS, QIT_ERROR_CODE, QIT_DOWNLOAD_DATE, QIT_UPLOAD_DATE FROM POS_TOPUP_ACCOUNTING WHERE POS_TOPUP_ACCOUNTING.ID>${#TestCase#maxID} ORDER BY DAT_FILENAME ASC
SELECT t.parameters FROM TASK t WHERE t.id > '${#TestCase#maxID_Email}' AND t.TASK_TYPE_ID = 9 ORDER BY t.id DESC
